subject: Hostages
Athletics and Sports
Jews and Judaism
lead_paragraph: Sports helped Gilad Shalit get through his five years of captivity. Now, as a sportswriter, Shalit has some of the world’s most compelling sporting events available to him.
snippet: Sports helped Gilad Shalit get through his five years of captivity. Now, as a sportswriter, Shalit has some of the world’s most compelling sporting events available to him.
